summary.para: The ITfInsertAtSelection.InsertEmbeddedAtSelection method inserts an object at the selection or insertion point.

param.name: ec
param.para: Identifies the edit context. This is obtained from or .

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Bit field with one of the following values:
The ppRange parameter is NULL on exit.
Context is not modified but the ppRange parameter is set as if the insert occurred. Read-only access is sufficient. If this flag is not set, the ec parameter must have read/write access.
The TSF manager does not create a default composition if a composition is required. The caller must create a composition object that covers the inserted text before releasing the context lock.

param.name: ppRange
param.para: Position of the inserted object. Optional.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The ec parameter is an invalid edit cookie.
Context object is not on a document stack.
Context owner cannot handle objects of the type provided by the pDataObject parameter.

remarks.para: Callers can use the method to determine if a particular object type is likely to be accepted by this method.
To insert text instead of an IDataObject object, use the method.

summary.para: Inserts text at the selection or insertion point.

param.name: ec
param.para: Identifies the edit context. This is obtained from or .

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Bit field with one of the following values.

item.description: ppRange is NULL. This flag cannot be combined with the TF_IAS_QUERYONLY flag.

description.para: The context is not modified, but ppRange is set as if the insert had occurred. Read-only access is sufficient. If this flag is not set, ec must have read/write access. This flag cannot be combined with the TF_IAS_NOQUERY flag.
The manager will not create a default composition if a composition is required. The caller must create a composition object that covers the inserted text before releasing the context lock.

param.name: cch
param.para: Specifies the character count of the text in pchText.

param.name: ppRange
param.para: Receives the position of the inserted object.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The text service does not have a document lock
Context object is not on a document stack.

remarks.para: To insert an object instead of text, use .

summary.para: The ITfInsertAtSelection interface is implemented by the manager and is used by a text service to insert text or an embedded object in a context. The text service obtains this interface by calling ITfContext.QueryInterface.
